Source code for src.orchestration.cli

  1"""Module for orchestration.cli.
  2
  3NavMap:
  4- NavMap: Structure describing a module navmap.
  5- index_bm25: Build a BM25 index from chunk fixtures (id, title, section,….
  6- index_faiss: Train & build FAISS index from fixture dense vectors.
  7- api: Run the FastAPI app.
  8- e2e: Execute the skeleton Prefect flow and print completed stages.
  9"""
 10
 11from __future__ import annotations
 12
 13import json
 14import os
 15from typing import Final
 16
 17import numpy as np
 18import typer
 19from kgfoundry.embeddings_sparse.bm25 import get_bm25
 20from kgfoundry.vectorstore_faiss.gpu import FaissGpuIndex
 21
 22from kgfoundry_common.navmap_types import NavMap
 23
 24__all__ = ["api", "e2e", "index_bm25", "index_faiss"]
 25
 26__navmap__: Final[NavMap] = {
 27    "title": "orchestration.cli",
 28    "synopsis": "Module for orchestration.cli",
 29    "exports": __all__,
 30    "sections": [
 31        {
 32            "id": "public-api",
 33            "title": "Public API",
 34            "symbols": ["index_bm25", "index_faiss", "api", "e2e"],
 35        },
 36    ],
 37}
 38
 39app = typer.Typer(help="kgfoundry orchestration CLI")
 40
 41
 42# [nav:anchor index_bm25]
 43@app.command()


[docs]
 44def index_bm25(
 45    chunks_parquet: str = typer.Argument(..., help="Path to Parquet/JSONL with chunks"),
 46    backend: str = typer.Option("lucene", help="lucene|pure"),
 47    index_dir: str = typer.Option("./_indices/bm25", help="Output index directory"),
 48) -> None:
 49    """Build a BM25 index from chunk fixtures (id, title, section, body)."""
 50    os.makedirs(index_dir, exist_ok=True)
 51    # Very small loader that supports JSONL in this skeleton (Parquet in real pipeline).
 52    docs: list[tuple[str, dict[str, str]]] = []
 53    if chunks_parquet.endswith(".jsonl"):
 54        with open(chunks_parquet, encoding="utf-8") as fh:
 55            for line in fh:
 56                rec = json.loads(line)
 57                docs.append(
 58                    (
 59                        rec["chunk_id"],
 60                        {
 61                            "title": rec.get("title", ""),
 62                            "section": rec.get("section", ""),
 63                            "body": rec.get("text", ""),
 64                        },
 65                    )
 66                )
 67    else:
 68        # naive: expect a JSON file with list under skeleton; replace with Parquet
 69        # reader in implementation
 70        with open(chunks_parquet, encoding="utf-8") as fh:
 71            data = json.load(fh)
 72        for rec in data:
 73            docs.append(
 74                (
 75                    rec["chunk_id"],
 76                    {
 77                        "title": rec.get("title", ""),
 78                        "section": rec.get("section", ""),
 79                        "body": rec.get("text", ""),
 80                    },
 81                )
 82            )
 83    idx = get_bm25(backend, index_dir, k1=0.9, b=0.4)
 84    idx.build(docs)
 85    typer.echo(f"BM25 index built at {index_dir} using backend={backend} ({type(idx).__name__})")


 86
 87
 88# [nav:anchor index_faiss]
 89@app.command()


[docs]
 90def index_faiss(
 91    dense_vectors: str = typer.Argument(..., help="Path to dense vectors JSON (skeleton)"),
 92    index_path: str = typer.Option(
 93        "./_indices/faiss/shard_000.idx", help="Output index (CPU .idx)"
 94    ),
 95) -> None:
 96    """Train & build FAISS index from fixture dense vectors.
 97
 98    In this skeleton we accept a JSON with entries: {key: str, vector: List[float]}.
 99    """
100    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(index_path), exist_ok=True)
101    with open(dense_vectors, encoding="utf-8") as fh:
102        vecs = json.load(fh)
103    keys = [r["key"] for r in vecs]
104    vectors = np.array([r["vector"] for r in vecs], dtype="float32")
105    # Train and add
106    vs = FaissGpuIndex()
107    vs.train(vectors[: min(len(vectors), 10000)])  # small train set
108    vs.add(keys, vectors)
109    # Save CPU form when possible
110    try:
111        vs.save(index_path, None)
112        typer.echo(f"FAISS index saved to {index_path}")
113    except Exception as e:
114        typer.echo(f"Saved fallback matrix (npz) due to {e!r}")
115        vs.save(index_path, None)


116
117
118# [nav:anchor api]
119@app.command()


[docs]
120def api(port: int = 8080) -> None:
121    """Run the FastAPI app."""
122    import uvicorn
123
124    uvicorn.run("search_api.app:app", host="0.0.0.0", port=port, reload=False)


125
126
127# [nav:anchor e2e]
128@app.command()


[docs]
129def e2e() -> None:
130    """Execute the skeleton Prefect flow and print completed stages."""
131    try:
132        from orchestration.flows import e2e_flow
133    except ModuleNotFoundError as exc:  # pragma: no cover - defensive messaging
134        typer.echo(
135            "Prefect is required for the e2e pipeline command. "
136            "Install it via `pip install -e '.[gpu]'` or add `prefect` manually.",
137            err=True,
138        )
139        raise typer.Exit(code=1) from exc
140
141    stages = e2e_flow()
142    for step in stages:
143        typer.echo(step)


144
145
146if __name__ == "__main__":
147    app()
